name: Lornsword Winter Chronicle
detailed_description: Lornsword Winter Chronicle is a story-driven action strategy game. Be the general on the battlefield and take direct action to command your soldiers and set up your economy. Fight on the front line, build your base, search for artifacts, capture mines and farms... You will have to decide what is the best use of your limited time. You can call a friend to join and help you at any moment but you will share resources and have to coordinate your actions together. The Lorn Empire counts on you, keep your mind pure and your Lornsword sharp!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lornsword is best played with a controller
